name: 2 Tasty
storyline:
Libby is fresh out of culinary school ready to serve the world delicious treats. With her best friend Cole at her side, making it through this new stage of life is about to get a little more complicated. Cole has developed feelings for Libby, but unfortunately, he is too shy to make them known. As for Libby, handling a rush of customers is just about all the excitement she can deal with. Something has to give. 
 
Follow along with Libby and discover the recipe for success in love and work. Play 50 levels in five distinct locations searching for ingredients on the shelves to cook up and serve. Use kitchen appliances to dice up greens, bake buns and cook tasty cakes. The faster you prepare, the more money you'll earn to purchase new equipment. With hundreds of cleverly hidden ingredients, up to four multiple screens to search through, and the prospect of love around the corner, this is one cooking lesson that will tantalize your taste buds
summary:
Grab a spoonful of excitement in 2 Tasty, and experience one part cooking to two parts romance in a fantastic blend of fun!  
  
Enjoy romance with a dash of Hidden Object and Time Management fun.  
Help Libby discover the recipe for success in work and love.  
Search for ingredients to dice up greens, bake buns and cook tasty cakes.  
Play 50 levels with up to four multiple search screens.  
Unlock tasty recipes and use them in your own kitchen.
